underlying_goal: Improve the project's documentation and tooling to establish a clear and robust convention for running experiments using persistent tmux sessions.
primary_success: Articulated the key advantage of tmux-cli (persistence) over run_in_background and created a comprehensive plan to update both the global documentation and the `/run-experiment` skill.
brief_summary: User requested clearer guidance on using tmux for persistent experiments. Claude investigated the existing setup, explained the benefits of tmux-cli over `run_in_background`, and created a detailed plan to update CLAUDE.md and the `/run-experiment` skill to reflect this best practice. The session concluded after the plan was generated.
